textTemplates.name: emailnotification7daystemplate
textTemplates.text:
Please note, that your account {!Loop_through_selected_Accounts.Name} will be blocked in 3 days.

To avoid your account getting into Stop List, please ask the client to pay the outstanding balance {!Loop_through_selected_Accounts.Balance__c}
